DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial compare immediate 12 hour postoperative removal urinary catheter elective cesarean section ; whether early removal associate low risk urinary infection compare delayed catheter removal .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Immediate Versus Delayed Removal Urinary Catheter Following Elective Cesarean Section
DOC.criteria: Women admit prenatal ward primary repeat elective cesarean section urinary infection ( assess clinically midstream urinalysis ) , significant vaginal bleeding , severe preeclampsia eclampsia and/or condition require postoperative monitoring urinary output , contraindication general anesthesia .
